label: A4B3_cI28_220_c_a-001
title: Th$_{3}$P$_{4}$ ($D7_{3}$) Structure
comments: The Th$_{3}$P$_{4}$ structure allows a large degree of disorder in the thorium (12a) site.  Compounds of the form AB$_{2}$C$_{4}$ have the A and B atoms mixed on the (12a) site (Flahaut, 1965).  Compounds of the form A$_{2}$B$_{3}$ should more properly be listed as A$_{3-x}$B$_{4}$, with $x$ in the range [0,1/3] and a corresponding number of vacancies distributed statistically on the (12a) site (Zachariasen, 1949).
